mapper.insert: /* ncis.sql.cmn.rnSlbIp.insertRnSlbIp */ INSERT INTO RN_SLB_IP ( IP_ADDR /* IP주소 */ , PORT /* 포트 */ , VIP_ADDR /* VIP주소 */ , WVL /* 가중치(로드밸런싱) */ , DC /* 설명 */ , VM_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{ipAddr} /* IP주소 */ , #{port} /* 포트 */ , #{vipAddr} /* VIP주소 */ , #{wvl} /* 가중치(로드밸런싱) */ , #{dc} /* 설명 */ , #{vmSeq} )
mapper.update: /* ncis.sql.cmn.rnSlb.mergeRnSlbIp */ WITH UPSERT AS ( SELECT #{ipAddr}::text AS IP_ADDR /* IP주소 */ , #{port} AS PORT /* 포트 */ , #{vipAddr}::text AS VIP_ADDR /* VIP주소 */ , #{wvl} AS WVL /* 가중치(로드밸런싱) */ , #{dc}::text AS DC /* 설명 */ , #{vmSeq} AS VM_SEQ ), UPDATE_OPTION AS ( UPDATE RN_SLB_IP SLB1 SET WVL = UPSERT.WVL , DC = UPSERT.DC , PORT = UPSERT.PORT FROM UPSERT WHERE SLB1.VM_SEQ = UPSERT.VM_SEQ AND SLB1.VIP_ADDR = UPSERT.VIP_ADDR AND SLB1.IP_ADDR = UPSERT.IP_ADDR ) INSERT INTO RN_SLB_IP (IP_ADDR , PORT , VIP_ADDR , WVL , DC , VM_SEQ , DEL_YN ) SELECT UPSERT.IP_ADDR , UPSERT.PORT , UPSERT.VIP_ADDR , UPSERT.WVL , UPSERT.DC , UPSERT.VM_SEQ , 'N' FROM UPSERT WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM RN_SLB_IP AS SLB WHERE SLB.VM_SEQ = UPSERT.VM_SEQ AND SLB.VIP_ADDR = UPSERT.VIP_ADDR AND SLB.IP_ADDR = UPSERT.IP_ADDR )
